ocr_qa.question: What insulation type is noted inside the roof assembly on the wall section view?
evidence: The label 'R-38 Batt Insulation' appears inside the roof assembly on the wall section view.

ocr_qa.question: What is the sheet number in the title block?
evidence: The title block shows 'A302' at the lower-right.

ocr_qa.question: What is the sheet title printed at the bottom of the page?
According to the section view - porch detail, what is the max rise and min run of the stairs?
evidence: The section view - porch detail label includes the note 'Max rise: 7'-3/4", Min run: 10".

spatial_qa.question: Where is the crawlspace shown in the bottom-right building section?
spatial_qa.answer: Below the first floor, at the bottom left portion of the section.
evidence: The label 'CRAWL SPACE' appears under the floor structure in the left lower area of the section.

counting_qa.question: How many building sections are shown on this sheet? and what are the section names?
counting_qa.answer: Four (4) sections. 1-Building Section, 2-Wall Section, 3-Typ Porch - Flashing detail, and 4-Section view - porch
evidence: The sheet contains 1-Building Section, 2-Wall Section, 3-Typ Porch - Flashing detail, and 4-Section view - porch.

comparison_qa.question: Which view provides the most detailed information about the roof pitch?
evidence: The wall section view provides the most detailed information about the roof pitch.

comparison_qa.question: Which view gives better information about the section view of the stairs?
evidence: The building section view has more information about the stairs.
